issue.title: world frame does not go with tf across network

content.raw: When we connect from the Operator Control Unit to the Field Computer, @scpeters it seems like you are treating the OCU like a ROS slave and connecting to the Field Computer as the ROS Master.  Is that you're setup?  This is different than what was indicated previously, for example, in the Competitor Packet... there I thought it indicated we were responsible for TCP or UDP communication.
content.html: When we connect from the Operator Control Unit to the Field Computer, @scpeters it seems like you are treating the OCU like a ROS slave and connecting to the Field Computer as the ROS Master. Is that you're setup? This is different than what was indicated previously, for example, in the Competitor Packet... there I thought it indicated we were responsible for TCP or UDP communication.
